plot outline: Nandan a thief steals for living but only up to his needs he enters the farmhouse of a politician Amrajit Patil and steals things according to his needs.But has a bad luck as Amrajit arrives with a dancer Shraddha and calls the cops.Amrajit lied to his wife Anjali that he is going to Delhi for a political meeting who finds him suspicious and sends Inspector Abhinandan to spy on him.But things take a turn when Anjali arrives at the farmhouse and finds all three of them.
title: Choricha Mamla
plot: Nandan a thief steals for living but only up to his needs he enters the farmhouse of a politician Amrajit Patil and steals things according to his needs.But has a bad luck as Amrajit arrives with a dancer Shraddha and calls the cops.Amrajit lied to his wife Anjali that he is going to Delhi for a political meeting who finds him suspicious and sends Inspector Abhinandan to spy on him.But things take a turn when Anjali arrives at the farmhouse and finds all three of them.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Nandan is happy in his own small world with wife Asha and twin daughters Mumu and Popi he steals for living but only up to his needs and prime target is bungalow of politician Amrajeet Patil.Nandan reaches his bungalow to steal but Patil arrives there with a dancer Shraddha and has lied to his wife Anjali that he is going to Delhi Anjali is smart enough and puts inspector Abhinandan at work to find Patil details.Patil and Shraddha come across Nandan in the bungalow who wants to escape with the money but after a while the door bell rings and its Anjali at the door in order to save himself Patil asks Nandan to pose as husband of Sharddha.The mad twist and turns happening around to make it worst Asha whose frequently calling Nandan asking when he will be home hears a female voice and starts to suspect him.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
